fxmlgui

Class PlayerView

  • java.lang.Object
    • fxmlgui.PlayerView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class PlayerView
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class is the main controller of what the user will see. It controls what is shown to the user as the game is being played. It also provides some methods for a human player to play the game.
    Author:
    William Elliman

      • getBid

        public int getBid(int highestBid)
        A method for HumanPlayer to get input.
        Parameters:
        highestBid - the highest bid so far. This will be used to update the announcement text.
        Returns:
        the bid the HumanPlayer would like to make.
